once upon a time in a small village
there lived a young man who worked as a
woodcutter named cedric his estate was
nothing but an iron axe
although he was poor he had inherently
loving character
he usually cut a lot of firewood
and brought them to the market to sell
in exchange for rice to provide for the
needy people he met
so all the poor people in the area loved
him so much
one day on his way home from cutting
firewood he suddenly saw an old man
lying shivering under a tree he was
moved with compassion and immediately
took off the cloak he was wearing and
covered the old man
after a while cedric was cutting wood in
the forest one day when suddenly he
heard the sound of a harpist playing in
the high mountains
he stopped to listen avidly
the next day he heard the sound of the
harp on the mountain like yesterday
the next two days from the same old
mountain the familiar sound was played
again
surprisingly he stopped chopping wood
hooked the axe to his waist and found
his way up the mountain determined to
find the harpist
finally in a wide field he saw an old
man sitting on a stone the old man was
engrossed in playing the harp and did
not know that someone was approaching
cedric realized that this old man was
very similar to the old man lying under
the tree the other day
cedric waited for the piece to finish
and then walk over to where the old man
was sitting

son is it tiring to find the way up here
i purposely sat here waiting for you
that day you sacrificed your only coat
for me so now i give you a new coat it
will help you a lot
then the old man put the cloak on cedric
and disappeared in his

ability to make him invisible

people
beat them then suddenly those same names

area
